operator.name: Operator
operator.desc: The standard issue operative. Reliable and efficient.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.desc: Swift and precise. Starts with the Freerunner protocol.

demolitionist.name: Demolitionist
demolitionist.desc: An ordinance expert. Starts with a Det-Charge and the Overcharge protocol.

technomancer.name: Technomancer
technomancer.desc: An expert in module efficiency. Starts with the Module Recycler protocol.
